name: dots β | Jump Across
description:
Welcome to "dots.beta".

The "dots.beta" is a new, free and addictive game for someone who is patient and wants to climbup on the LeaderBoard.

How to play:
Touch the screen to move, avoid all the obstacles and keep moving before you explode.

Includes:
- Battle your friends score with Game Center.
- Free download (with in app purchase for removing ads).

Powered by WC Games:
http://wc-games.com

Developed by OdiusFly Studio:
http://odiusfly.com

Graphics by MadPixel:
http://madpixel.gr
